mapper.select: select s.* ,t.flag as openService,CONCAT(t.time1,',',t.time2,',',t.time3,',',t.time4,',',t.time5) as serviceTimes from shop_info s left join time_info t on s.sid=t.sid where s.sid=#{sid} and t.weeks=#{dw} and s.status>0
select * from shop_info where name=#{name} and status>0

select s.*,t.flag as openService,CONCAT(t.time1,',',t.time2,',',t.time3,',',t.time4,',',t.time5) as serviceTimes from shop_info s left join time_info t on s.sid=t.sid where (s.longitude between #{minlon} and #{maxlon}) and (s.latitude between #{minlat} and #{maxlat}) and t.weeks=#{dw} and s.status>0

select distinct s.*,count(m.mid) as orderCount from shop_info s join menu m on m.sid=s.sid where (m.longitude between #{minlon} and #{maxlon}) and (m.latitude between #{minlat} and #{maxlat}) and m.status=1 and m.uid!=#{uid} group by m.sid

select count(*) from shop_info where status>0
and name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{searchStr}),'%')
select sid,name from shop_info where status>0
